content.title: About Us
content.heading: Origins
content.p: In 1992, Pastor Allen Rigg was sent from Calvary Chapel San Bernardino, California with a calling from God to plant a Calvary Chapel here in Austin Texas. Now, you can learn more about our vision or history online. Don't know where we are? Check out the Location page for a map.
content.heading: Affiliation
content.p: Calvary Chapel is a non-denominational fellowship affiliated with Calvary Chapel-Costa Mesa in Costa Mesa, California. If you are looking for a church home in your area, please see the Calvary affiliates pages to find a Calvary near you.
content.heading: For more information...
content.p: As for this fellowship, the links listed below will provide you more information about who we are, where we've come from, and what we're all about. Explore and, if you'd like, contact us with any questions. View our history in Real Video. We also have our statement of faith available.
View our weekly schedule online so you can find out when we meet, and meet our staff so you know who you may want to talk to between services for further questions.
